title: peripheral
extract: A computer peripheral is any external device that provides input and output for the computer. For example, a keyboard and mouse are input peripherals, while a monitor and printer are output peripherals. ... For an extended list of variousperipheral devices, view this Help Center article.
extract_html: A computer peripheral is any external device that provides input and output for the computer. For example, a keyboard and mouse are input peripherals, while a monitor and printer are output peripherals. ... For an extended list of variousperipheral devices, view this Help Center article.
